title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Tree widget and the Text widget are children of the Shell. The issue currently only occurs on Windows. One possible workaround is to create the Text widget as a sibling of the Tree widget and move it above the Tree widget.
OB: Currently, when you click anywhere in the Tree widget, the Tree widget gets focus and the Text widget does not lose focus.
EB: Expected behavior is that when you click anywhere in the Tree widget, the Tree widget should gain focus and the Text widget should lose focus.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the application. 
2. Click anywhere in the Tree widget. 

Expected result: The Tree widget gains focus and the Text widget loses focus.
